name: Divis Scaldz
content:
Divis Scaldz was a human male that lived in the galaxy.
Divis Scaldz was given a name when he appeared as a unlockable Play Set Townsperson in Disney Infinity 3.0. Despite the game's non-canon status, Lucasfilm Story Group member Pablo Hidalgo stated on Twitter that all names used in the game are considered canon.
